title: Anyone near Rotherham heading to the West midlands

posts.content:
Anyone near or passing by Wickersley, Rotherham and heading to anywhere between birmingham airport and Dudley - let me know and i'll pay you for a space in your boot - not exactly vw, although it will be seen ripping round shows, as its my Son's first pedal bike (so a very small one) size of a suitcase

so;

collection from ; Wickersley, Rotherham

delivery to ; anywhere between birmingham airport and Dudley, or anywhere nearer to me than rotherham

VW/beer/fuel tokens offered of course.

Cheers,
Neil

When do you need this doing? I am in kidderminster but my folks live near your pick up its a 5 min drive, there coming up soon to see me and I go to see them too, you may have possibly sorted but the offer is there dude.

thanks a lot for the offer mate, i did get it sorted tho.
Cheers,
Neil
